description: My beloved little apartment is close to Central Park, museum mile, the east river esplanade and the boutiques, bars and restaurants of Manhattan's Upper East Side. It's on a quiet tree-lined street and features a quirky, cosy living space and peaceful, light-drenched bedroom. Kitty overlord suggests people with pet allergies should skip this listing!
name: Comfort and charm: 1BDR on Upper East Side
review: In addition to getting a great location, with loads of restaurants and bars nearby and Central Park in easy walking distance, you get a great host! Ceri was so welcoming and helpful--from giving me a beer that was much-needed after 24 hours of air travel to answering questions about places to eat and drink in the area. She was prompt about communicating before and during my stay. And her cat, Chester, is the best.
